title: Zuckerberg launches Facebook's Washington defense
text:
Zuckerberg launches Facebook's Washington defense 3:38pm EDT - 02:16 
Facebook Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg held private meetings with some U.S. lawmakers on Monday, a day before he is due to appear at Congressional hearings over a political consultancy’s use of customer data and Russian attempts to sway 2016 elections.   
Facebook Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg held private meetings with some U.S. lawmakers on Monday, a day before he is due to appear at Congressional hearings over a political consultancy’s use of customer data and Russian attempts to sway 2016 elections.  //reut.rs/2HmyNTj
